## Description

The **sleep** component temporarily stops the execution of an integration for a specified amount of time.
This is handy if your integration needs to wait for a known amount of time while a third party service performs some task.

Sleep time is measured in milliseconds.
For example, to sleep for 5.5 seconds, enter 5500 as your `ms` input.
Note that relying on sleep is not generally best practice for development.
If you are waiting on a third-party service to complete a task, check if the third party offers an endpoint you can query for task status, and build a [code block](/docs/composer/builder/builder-components/code.mdx) or custom component around that.

## Actions

<div id="sleep" />

### Sleep

Sleep for a number of milliseconds before continuing the integration. | <small><b>key: sleep</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      key: "ms",
      type: "string",
      label: "Milliseconds",
      placeholder: "Milliseconds",
      default: "1000",
      comments: "The number of milliseconds to sleep",
      example: "1000",
      required: true,
    },
  ]}
/>
